scripts.init: git submodule init && git submodule update --recursive --remote && cd src/util/session && npm install
scripts.generate:session: cp session.config.js src/util/session/config.js && node src/util/session/index.js > public/json/session.json
scripts.redirect:qa: cd dist && mkdir qa && cp app.html ./qa/r0.html && cp app.html ./qa/r1.html && cp app.html ./qa/r2.html && cp app.html ./qa/r3.html && cp app.html ./qa/s.html
scripts.redirect:record: cd dist && mkdir record && cp app.html ./record/r0.html && cp app.html ./record/r1.html && cp app.html ./record/r2.html && cp app.html ./record/r3.html && cp app.html ./record/s.html
scripts.generate:mail: cp -R template/mail/assets public/mail && heml build template/mail/SITCON-2021.heml --output public/mail/SITCON-2021.html
